thread.title: Price, CCM make massive equipment donation to Williams Lake
thread.title_full: Price, CCM make massive equipment donation to Williams Lake

author: Monster storm makes landfall as category 5 in Mexico
title: Price, CCM make massive equipment donation to Williams Lake
text:
Price, CCM make massive equipment donation to Williams Lake theScore 23 hrs ago © Jean-Yves Ahern / USA TODAY Sports The Montreal Canadiens can do no wrong, on or off the ice.
AdChoices Carey Price and CCM sent a massive donation this week to Williams Lake, British Columbia, where Price grew up playing hockey, writes The Williams Lake Tribune's Greg Sabotino .
Thousands of dollars worth of equipment now fills Williams Lake Minor Hockey office administrator Pam Povelofskie's office.
"It's a good mess," she said. "I love it."
Related: Canadiens' P.K. Subban donating $10M to Montreal children's hospital
Price grew up five hours away in Anahim Lake, and his father, Jerry, organized the donation, saying it was something his son wanted to do.
"I'm very humbled Jerry and Carey and CCM still think of Williams Lake Minor Hockey," said Todd Isnardy, who serves as a coordinator for the Williams Lake Minor Hockey Association.
The donation includes goalie equipment, hockey sticks, and other gear, and will be distributed across the community.
